Blackstone Curse.name: Blackstone Curse
Blackstone Curse.flavor: Your weapon attack inflicts a vicious curse on your foe, which appears to turn to cracked black stone as it is held fast.
Blackstone Curse.onHit: 1[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and the target is petrified until the end of your next turn.

Aspect of the Blackstone Gaoler.name: Aspect of the Blackstone Gaoler
Aspect of the Blackstone Gaoler.flavor: Your attack wracks an enemy’s mind and binds its body in stone as you channel the blackstone monolith’s forbidding power.
Aspect of the Blackstone Gaoler.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and ongoing 10 psychic damage (save ends).
Aspect of the Blackstone Gaoler.firstFailedSavingThrow: The target is restrained until it saves against the ongoing damage.
Aspect of the Blackstone Gaoler.secondFailedSavingThrow: The target is petrified instead of restrained and takes a -2 penalty to saving throws against the ongoing damage. The ongoing damage from this power ignores the resistance granted by the petrified condition.
Aspect of the Blackstone Gaoler.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 10 psychic damage (save ends).
Aspect of the Blackstone Gaoler.effect: You gain resistance to all damage equal to your Constitution modifier until the end of your next turn. In addition, one creature you hit with the at-will power is restrained until the end of your next turn.

Monolithic Blessing.name: Monolithic Blessing
Monolithic Blessing.flavor: The monolith’s power grants you the resilience of ageless stone.
Monolithic Blessing.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you have tremorsense 5 and resist 10 to all damage.
